price: De ki: “Benim size bir zarar vermeye de, sizi doğru yola iletmeye de gücüm yetmez.''
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّي لَآ أَمۡلِكُ لَكُمۡ ضَرّٗا وَلَا رَشَدٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: qul innī lā amliku lakum ḍarran walā rashadan
